name: pliq: Epic Clash Arcade Puzzle
description:
Beware of evil dragons, zombies and merciless demons. Fight back with your brave knights, your ravishing full-grown dragons, glorious kings and queens by using your experienced super puzzle skills.

FOR THE VICTORY!

The playing method is same as before; Join this endless war, observe the upcoming pattern of enemies shaped as jelly blocks, build a perfect match with your block shaped heroes. If the descending pattern of enemies don’t match with your pattern, your blocks will be locked.

KEEP YOUR FACE UP!

No worries! Because you can still fix the situation with the next descending pattern. Also, there is some very effective boosters that we’ve got for you to destroy your strong enemies, hold the line, save the kingdom and the throne!

HONOUR YOUR HOUSE!

As you’re having your victories against your enemies, you will be rewarded with precious badges which are representing the highlights of the epic fiction and the steps which will lead you to the top of the local and global ranking where you can wave your house’s flag! You can’t imagine a battle without house flags and valiant bannermen right? So, once again, get ready for a unique puzzle challenge!

Come and join the endless war with pliq!
